snippet: The Manhattan district attorney’s office has subpoenaed documents concerning a range of the troubled agency’s major construction projects, a person with knowledge of the matter said.
abstract: Manhattan district attorney’s office subpoenas documents from Port Authority of New York and New Jersey concerning range of troubled agency’s major construction projects; it includes several that have come under scrutiny as result of George Washington Bridge lane closings.
lead_paragraph: The Manhattan district attorney’s office has subpoenaed documents concerning a range of the troubled agency’s major construction projects, a person with knowledge of the matter said.

headline.main: Another Prosecutor Is Said to Investigate Port Authority
headline.print_headline: New Inquiry Said to Focus on Port Agency

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
